name: Sakema GENTLES, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Sakema GENTLES, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
993 A.2d 269
Sakema GENTLES, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 28, 2010.
